## LOADING LIBRARY

We are loading some library to clean the data and create the map.

```{r load library}
library(tidyverse)
library(purrr)
library( broom)
library(tigris)
library(viridis)
library(sf)


```
```{r}
homicides <- read_csv("../data/homicide-data.csv")

homicides <- homicides %>%
  unite(col = city_name, c(city, state), sep=", ") %>%
  filter(city_name=="Las Vegas, NV")

head(homicides)
```

We filtered the data frame to keep only the homicides in Las Vegas.


```{r}
map_lv <- tracts( state="NV", county = "Clark county", 
                  year = NULL, class="sf")


ggplot(data = map_lv)+
  geom_sf()
  

```
